```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
trait_files <- list.files(
  "~/RRD.Reclassification_final/flowcytometer_traits/",
  full.names = TRUE
)

invisible(
  pbapply::pblapply(
    trait_files,
    function(fn){
      traits <- readRDS(fn)
      traits$FSC.A |> 
        density(bw = 0.00001) |>
        plot( main = paste0("FSC.A ", basename(fn))) |>
        abline( v = quantile(traits$FSC.A, probs = c(0.05, 0.95), na.rm = TRUE) )
    }
  )
)
```
